eventSummary:
Dozens of fake wallet add-ons were recently discovered on Firefox's official stores, designed to steal seed phrases. Users are advised to audit extensions and only use official wallet links.
Sources:
- https://t.me/Kucoin_News/31604

A user reported a suspicious call claiming to be from Coinbase regarding an 'external wallet connected,' which attempted to bypass 2FA.
Sources:
- https://www.reddit.com/r/CoinBase/comments/1mly5uo/call_from_coinbase_due_to_external_wallet/

entities: Wells Fargo, JPMorgan Chase, US Bank
eventSummary:
Scammers have drained over $100,000 from bank accounts, with police indicating that Zelle, Wells Fargo, JPMorgan Chase, US Bank, and Bitcoin were targeted.
Sources:
- https://news.google.?oc=5
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/24068781/Bank-Customers-Warned-As-Scammers-Drain-Over-100000-From-Accounts-Police-Say-Zelle-Wells-Fargo-JPMorgan-Chase-US-Bank-and-Bitcoin-Targeted
